member.name: P:NVorbis.Contracts.IContainerReader.CanSeek

member.summary: Gets the number of bits dedicated to container framing and overhead.

member.name: P:NVorbis.Contracts.IContainerReader.WasteBits
member.summary: Gets the number of bits that were skipped due to container framing and overhead.

member.summary: Attempts to initialize the container.
member.returns: if successful, otherwise .

member.name: M:NVorbis.Contracts.IContainerReader.FindNextStream
member.summary: Searches for the next logical stream in the container.
member.returns: if a new stream was found, otherwise .

member.name: T:NVorbis.Contracts.IPacket
member.summary: Describes a packet of data from a data stream.

member.name: P:NVorbis.Contracts.IPacket.IsResync
member.summary: Gets whether this packet occurs immediately following a loss of sync in the stream.

member.name: P:NVorbis.Contracts.IPacket.IsShort
member.summary: Gets whether this packet did not read its full data.

member.name: P:NVorbis.Contracts.IPacket.GranulePosition
member.summary: Gets the granule position of the packet, if known.

member.name: P:NVorbis.Contracts.IPacket.IsEndOfStream
member.summary: Gets whether the packet is the last packet of the stream.

member.name: P:NVorbis.Contracts.IPacket.BitsRead
member.summary: Gets the number of bits read from the packet.

member.name: P:NVorbis.Contracts.IPacket.BitsRemaining
member.summary: Gets the number of bits left in the packet.

member.name: P:NVorbis.Contracts.IPacket.ContainerOverheadBits
member.summary: Gets the number of container overhead bits associated with this packet.

member.name: M:NVorbis.Contracts.IPacket.TryPeekBits(System.Int32,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Attempts to read the specified number of bits from the packet. Does not advance the read position.
member.param: The number of bits to read.
Outputs the actual number of bits read.
member.returns: The value of the bits read.

member.name: M:NVorbis.Contracts.IPacket.SkipBits(System.Int32)
member.summary: Advances the read position by the the specified number of bits.
member.param: The number of bits to skip reading.

member.name: M:NVorbis.Contracts.IPacket.ReadBits(System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads the specified number of bits from the packet and advances the read position.
member.param: The number of bits to read.
member.returns: The value read. If not enough bits remained, this will be a truncated value.

member.name: M:NVorbis.Contracts.IPacket.Done
member.summary: Frees the buffers and caching for the packet instance.

member.name: M:NVorbis.Contracts.IPacket.Reset
member.summary: Resets the read buffers to the beginning of the packet.

member.name: T:NVorbis.Contracts.GetPacketGranuleCount
member.summary: Encapsulates a method that calculates the number of granules decodable from the specified packet.
member.param: The to calculate.
if the packet is the very first packet in the stream, otherwise .
member.returns: The calculated number of granules.

member.name: T:NVorbis.Contracts.IPacketProvider
member.summary: Describes an interface for a packet stream reader.

member.name: P:NVorbis.Contracts.IPacketProvider.CanSeek
member.summary: Gets whether the provider supports seeking.

member.name: P:NVorbis.Contracts.IPacketProvider.StreamSerial
member.summary: Gets the serial number of this provider's data stream.

member.name: M:NVorbis.Contracts.IPacketProvider.GetNextPacket
member.summary: Gets the next packet in the stream and advances to the next packet position.
member.returns: The instance for the next packet if available, otherwise .

member.name: M:NVorbis.Contracts.IPacketProvider.PeekNextPacket
member.summary: Gets the next packet in the stream without advancing to the next packet position.
member.returns: The instance for the next packet if available, otherwise .

member.name: M:NVorbis.Contracts.IPacketProvider.SeekTo(System.Int64,System.Int32,NVorbis.Contracts.GetPacketGranuleCount)
member.summary: Seeks the stream to the packet that is prior to the requested granule position by the specified preroll number of packets.
member.param: The granule position to seek to.
The number of packets to seek backward prior to the granule position.
A delegate that returns the number of granules in the specified packet.
member.returns: The granule position at the start of the packet containing the requested position.

member.name: M:NVorbis.Contracts.IPacketProvider.GetGranuleCount
member.summary: Gets the total number of granule available in the stream.

member.name: M:NVorbis.Contracts.IStreamDecoder.Read(System.Single[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads samples into the specified buffer.
member.param: The buffer to read the samples into.
The index to start reading samples into the buffer.
The number of samples that should be read into the buffer. Must be a multiple of .
member.returns: The number of samples read into the buffer.
member.exception: Thrown when the buffer is too small or is less than zero.
member.remarks: The data populated into is interleaved by channel in normal PCM fashion: Left, Right, Left, Right, Left, Right

member.summary: Resets the counters for bit rate and bits.

member.name: P:NVorbis.Contracts.IStreamStats.EffectiveBitRate
member.summary: Gets the calculated bit rate of audio stream data for the everything decoded so far.

member.name: P:NVorbis.Contracts.IStreamStats.InstantBitRate
member.summary: Gets the calculated bit rate per second of audio for the last two packets.

member.name: P:NVorbis.Contracts.IStreamStats.ContainerBits
member.summary: Gets the number of framing bits used by the container.

member.name: P:NVorbis.Contracts.IStreamStats.OverheadBits
member.summary: Gets the number of bits read that do not contribute to the output audio. Does not include framing bits from the container.

member.name: P:NVorbis.Contracts.IStreamStats.AudioBits
member.summary: Gets the number of bits read that contribute to the output audio.

member.name: P:NVorbis.Contracts.IStreamStats.WasteBits
member.summary: Gets the number of bits skipped.

member.name: P:NVorbis.Contracts.IStreamStats.PacketCount
member.summary: Gets the number of packets read.

member.name: M:NVorbis.StreamDecoder.Read(System.Single[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads samples into the specified buffer.
member.param: The buffer to read the samples into.
The index to start reading samples into the buffer.
The number of samples that should be read into the buffer. Must be a multiple of .
member.returns: The number of samples read into the buffer.
member.exception: Thrown when the buffer is too small or is less than zero.
member.remarks: The data populated into is interleaved by channel in normal PCM fashion: Left, Right, Left, Right, Left, Right
